DellFCPortMetrics.description: This resource shall represents the statistics of the Fibre Channel HBA port.
DellFCPortMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represents the statistics of the Fibre Channel HBA port.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FCLossOfSignals.description: This property represents loss of signals.
FCLossOfSignals.longDescription: This property represents loss of signals.

FCRxKBCount.description: This property represents the KB count received.
FCRxKBCount.longDescription: This property represents the KB count received.

FCRxSequences.description: This property represents the FC sequences received.
FCRxSequences.longDescription: This property represents the FC sequences received.

FCRxTotalFrames.description: This property represents the total FC frames received.
FCRxTotalFrames.longDescription: This property represents the total FC frames received.

FCTxKBCount.description: This property represents the KB count transmitted.
FCTxKBCount.longDescription: This property represents the KB count transmitted.

FCTxSequences.description: This property represents the FC sequences transmitted.
FCTxSequences.longDescription: This property represents the FC sequences transmitted.

FCTxTotalFrames.description: This property represents the total FC frames transmitted.
FCTxTotalFrames.longDescription: This property represents the total FC frames transmitted.

OSDriverState.description: This property indicates the OS driver states.
OSDriverState.longDescription: This property indicates the OS driver states.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

RXInputPowermW.description: Indicates the RX input power value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.
RXInputPowermW.longDescription: Indicates the RX input power value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.

TXBiasCurrentmA.description: Indicates the TX Bias current value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.
TXBiasCurrentmA.longDescription: Indicates the TX Bias current value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.

TXOutputPowermW.description: Indicates the TX output power value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.
TXOutputPowermW.longDescription: Indicates the TX output power value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.

TemperatureCelsius.description: Indicates the temperature value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.
TemperatureCelsius.longDescription: Indicates the temperature value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.

TemperatureStatus.description: Indicates the status of Temperature value limits.
TemperatureStatus.longDescription: Indicates the status of Temperature value limits.

VoltageStatus.description: Indicates the status of voltage value limits.
VoltageStatus.longDescription: Indicates the status of voltage value limits.

VoltageValueVolts.description: Indicates the voltage value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.
VoltageValueVolts.longDescription: Indicates the voltage value of Small Form Factor pluggable(SFP) Transceiver.

title: #DellFCPortMetrics.v1_0_0.DellFCPortMetrics
